Can't make it? Sign up anyway to get the replay!

Learn to write crisp, compelling emails that win you more work in less time.

You'll discover how to write emails that:

  • Get read and avoid the spam folder.
  • Address real needs and compel clients to respond.
  • Get a natural conversation going that's insanely interesting.
  • Above all else, are damn good at winning you work.
